description:
Their Kinetic Alpine 2.0 Pant is the perfect ‘pull-on, leave-on’ piece for fast-paced summer alpinists.
As part of their Ascent range, it features Stretch Nylon Woven Proflex™ with carefully zoned panels that are designed to cope with the increased abrasion and exposure of technical ascents without critically inflating the weight.

A slim, tailored cut with articulated knees provides far better freedom of movement than a traditional waterproof pant. The flat semi-elasticated waistband is comfortable with a harness, a plus a pair of zipped hem gussets enables you to expand the cuff for large mountaineering boots. Stripped back but high functioning, this is the ultimate in fast, light, free-moving protection for committed alpine adventurers.
name: Rab Kinetic Alpine 2.0 Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Stretch polyamide 20D Woven 3L with PU Membrane and Polyester Backer
Stretch polyamide 20D Woven 3L with PU Membrane and Polyester Backer
